resources.string: Black and Pinto Bean salad with red onions, garlic, corn and parsley
Shrimp and brown rice with broccoli, pea pods, green beans, carrots, tomatoes and Scallions
Chicken and black beans with a spring salad

•1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained 
•1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
•1 green bell pepper, chopped 
•1 red bell pepper, chopped
•1 (10 ounce) package corn kernels
•1 red onion, chopped
•1/2 cup olive oil
•1/2 cup red wine vinegar
•2 tablespoons fresh lime juice
•1 tablespoon lemon juice 
•1 clove crushed garlic
•1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley
•1/2 tablespoon ground cumin
•1/2 tablespoon ground black pepper
•1 dash hot pepper sauce
• 1/2 teaspoon chili powder
In a large bowl, combine beans, bell peppers, corn, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, lime juice, lemon juice, garlic, parsley, cumin, and black pepper. Season to taste with hot sauce and chili powder.
Pour olive oil dressing over vegetables; mix well. Chill thoroughly, and serve cold.
